title: Javelin/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Javelin "Javelin")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| ) [![Javelin.png](/images/1/1d/Javelin.png)](/wiki/File:Javelin.png) |                                                                                              |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 名称                                                                   | 标枪                                                                                           |
| 外观                                                                   | 投掷矛                                                                                          |
| 伤害（小型）                                                               | 1d6                                                                                          |
| 伤害（大型）                                                               | 1d6                                                                                          |
| 命中修正                                                                 | +0                                                                                           |
| 武器技能类别                                                               | [矛](/wiki/%E7%9F%9B "矛")                                                                     |
| 规格                                                                   | [单手](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%95%E6%89%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "单手 (page does not exist)") |
| 基础价                                                                  | 3 [zm](/wiki/Zm/zh-CN "Zm/zh-CN") （+10/正数附魔等级）                                               |
| 重量                                                                   | [20](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)") |
| 材料                                                                   | [铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")            |

**标枪**（javelin）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它是一种使用[矛](/wiki/%E7%9F%9B "矛")技能的单手武器，因此和矛一样，攻击[可贯穿](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%AF%E8%B4%AF%E7%A9%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "可贯穿 (page does not exist)")类别的怪物时会获得+2命中加成。未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时，它的外观为**投掷矛**（throwing spear）。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [3 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [4 起源](#.E8.B5.B7.E6.BA.90)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.3 EvilHack](#EvilHack)

- [6 百科文本](#.E7.99.BE.E7.A7.91.E6.96.87.E6.9C.AC)

- [7 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

标枪在随机生成武器中占比1.0%。

在[星界](/index.php?title=%E6%98%9F%E7%95%8C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "星界 (page does not exist)")生成的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")有1⁄116的概率获得标枪[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

## 策略

标枪比普通的矛更加罕见。它对小型怪物的伤害和矛一样，但对大型怪物的伤害稍低些。一般来说，玩家不需要考虑用标枪作为主要远程武器，除非在游戏前期找到了标枪，且角色有矛技能——即使如此，标枪在中后期一般也会被取代。

## 历史

标枪最初于[NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")加入游戏。在[NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3")及以前版本，标枪使用专属的**标枪**技能。这是因为标枪的使用方法和矛不同——标枪主要用于投掷，而矛主要用于刺。[NetHack 3.6.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.0 "NetHack 3.6.0")中，出于游戏性的考虑，标枪被并入了矛类别。

| 标枪   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| 最大等级 | [角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| 基础   | - [医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")、[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣 (page does not exist)")、[武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")、[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")、[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神 (page does not exist)")、[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)") |
| 熟练   | * [穴居人](/index.php?title=%E7%A9%B4%E5%B1%85%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "穴居人 (page does not exist)")、[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")、[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| 老练   | - [游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Javelin](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search/Javelin "wikipedia:Special:Search/Javelin")***

标枪是一种主要通过投掷使用的轻型矛。标枪的英文“javelin”源自中古英语，词源为古法语词汇“javelot”的指小词形式。标枪一般是徒手投掷使用，但也存在一些用于提升标枪射程的器械。

考古发掘证明人类在旧石器时代晚期已经开始使用标枪，标枪也常常被人们同古希腊和古罗马等古代文明联系起来。在现代，祖鲁民族的战士们仍然会使用标枪作为武器，但标枪更多还是作为体育器械使用。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Javelin/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 may retain the spear skill, while other variants based on later versions typically do not.

### SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") retains the javelin skill as separate from the spear skill. This also applies to [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").

### dNetHack

[dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") merges the javelin skill into the spear skill. The javelin deals 1d8 damage to all monsters, and can be poisoned, and the [atlatl](/index.php?title=Atlatl_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Atlatl (dNetHack) (page does not exist)") serves as a [launcher](/wiki/Launcher "Launcher") for javelins and other spears.

[Amhimitl](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Amhimitl "DNetHack artifacts") is a neutral [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") javelin made of [bone](/wiki/Bone "Bone") that acts as the [crowning](/wiki/Crowning "Crowning") gift for [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral") [Archeologists](/wiki/Archeologist "Archeologist"). It has +1d5 to-hit and deals +1d8 [fire](/wiki/Fire "Fire") damage against monsters without [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance"), along with +3d4 holy or unholy damage when blessed or cursed respectively. Amhimitl returns to your quiver when fired and can be [multishot](/wiki/Multishot "Multishot"), which causes it to be thrown immediately after returning multiple times in quick succession - the artifact does not return if it misfires, and any multishot is aborted if this occurs.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), a javelin can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining 2 [crossbow bolts](/wiki/Crossbow_bolt "Crossbow bolt") and a spear.

A javelin can be combined with a [glaive](/wiki/Glaive "Glaive") to create a [lance](/wiki/Lance "Lance").

## 百科文本

\- they come together with great random, and a spear is brast,  
and one party brake his shield and the other one goes down,  
horse and man, over his horse-tail and brake his neck, and  
then the next candidate comes randoming in, and brast his  
spear, and the other man brast his shield, and down he goes,  
horse and man, over his horse-tail, and brake his neck, and  
then there's another elected, and another and another and  
still another, till the material is all used up; and when you  
come to figure up results, you can't tell one fight from  
another, nor who whipped; and as a picture of living, raging,  
roaring battle, sho! why it's pale and noiseless - just  
ghosts scuffling in a fog. Dear me, what would this barren  
vocabulary get out of the mightiest spectacle? - the burning  
of Rome in Nero's time, for instance? Why, it would merely  
say 'Town burned down; no insurance; boy brast a window,  
fireman brake his neck!' Why, that ain't a picture!

\[ A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court, by Mark  
  Twain ]

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 155](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L155)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Javelin/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Javelin
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
)
名称 标枪
外观 投掷矛
伤害（小型） 1d6
伤害（大型） 1d6
命中修正 +0
武器技能类别 矛
规格 单手
基础价 3 zm
（+10/正数附魔等级）
重量 20
材料 铁

标枪（javelin）是NetHack中的一种武器。它是一种使用矛技能的单手武器，因此和矛一样，攻击可贯穿类别的怪物时会获得+2命中加成。未鉴定时，它的外观为投掷矛（throwing spear）。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 策略
  • 3 历史
  • 4 起源
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 dNetHack
    • 5.3 EvilHack
  • 6 百科文本
  • 7 引用及注释

生成

标枪在随机生成武器中占比1.0%。

在星界生成的玩家怪物有1⁄116的概率获得标枪[1]。

策略

标枪比普通的矛更加罕见。它对小型怪物的伤害和矛一样，但对大型怪物的伤害稍低些。一般来说，玩家不需要考虑用标枪作为主要远程武器，除非在游戏前期找到了标枪，且角色有矛技能——即使如此，标枪在中后期一般也会被取代。

历史

标枪最初于NetHack 1.3d加入游戏。在NetHack 3.4.3及以前版本，标枪使用专属的标枪技能。这是因为标枪的使用方法和矛不同——标枪主要用于投掷，而矛主要用于刺。NetHack 3.6.0中，出于游戏性的考虑，标枪被并入了矛类别。

标枪
最大等级 角色
基础
  • 医生、僧侣、武士、游客、女武神、巫师
熟练
  • 穴居人、骑士、牧师
老练
  • 游侠

起源

维基百科相关条目：
Javelin

标枪是一种主要通过投掷使用的轻型矛。标枪的英文“javelin”源自中古英语，词源为古法语词汇“javelot”的指小词形式。标枪一般是徒手投掷使用，但也存在一些用于提升标枪射程的器械。

考古发掘证明人类在旧石器时代晚期已经开始使用标枪，标枪也常常被人们同古希腊和古罗马等古代文明联系起来。在现代，祖鲁民族的战士们仍然会使用标枪作为武器，但标枪更多还是作为体育器械使用。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

Some variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 may retain the spear skill, while other variants based on later versions typically do not.

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM retains the javelin skill as separate from the spear skill. This also applies to SlashTHEM.

dNetHack

dNetHack merges the javelin skill into the spear skill. The javelin deals 1d8 damage to all monsters, and can be poisoned, and the atlatl serves as a launcher for javelins and other spears.

Amhimitl is a neutral artifact javelin made of bone that acts as the crowning gift for neutral Archeologists. It has +1d5 to-hit and deals +1d8 fire damage against monsters without fire resistance, along with +3d4 holy or unholy damage when blessed or cursed respectively. Amhimitl returns to your quiver when fired and can be multishot, which causes it to be thrown immediately after returning multiple times in quick succession - the artifact does not return if it misfires, and any multishot is aborted if this occurs.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, a javelin can be created at a forge by combining 2 crossbow bolts and a spear.

A javelin can be combined with a glaive to create a lance.

百科文本

- they come together with great random, and a spear is brast,
and one party brake his shield and the other one goes down,
horse and man, over his horse-tail and brake his neck, and
then the next candidate comes randoming in, and brast his
spear, and the other man brast his shield, and down he goes,
horse and man, over his horse-tail, and brake his neck, and
then there's another elected, and another and another and
still another, till the material is all used up; and when you
come to figure up results, you can't tell one fight from
another, nor who whipped; and as a picture of living, raging,
roaring battle, sho! why it's pale and noiseless - just
ghosts scuffling in a fog. Dear me, what would this barren
vocabulary get out of the mightiest spectacle? - the burning
of Rome in Nero's time, for instance? Why, it would merely
say 'Town burned down; no insurance; boy brast a window,
fireman brake his neck!' Why, that ain't a picture!

[ A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court, by Mark
  Twain ]

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 155

'''标枪'''（javelin）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[武器]]。它是一种使用[[矛]]技能的单手武器，因此和矛一样，攻击[[可贯穿]]类别的怪物时会获得+2命中加成。未[[鉴定]]时，它的外观为'''投掷矛'''（throwing spear）。

== 生成 ==
标枪在随机生成武器中占比1.0%。

在[[星界]]生成的[[玩家怪物]]有{{frac|116}}的概率获得标枪{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|155|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

== 策略 ==
标枪比普通的矛更加罕见。它对小型怪物的伤害和矛一样，但对大型怪物的伤害稍低些。一般来说，玩家不需要考虑用标枪作为主要远程武器，除非在游戏前期找到了标枪，且角色有矛技能——即使如此，标枪在中后期一般也会被取代。

== 历史 ==
标枪最初于[[NetHack 1.3d]]加入游戏。在[[NetHack 3.4.3]]及以前版本，标枪使用专属的'''标枪'''技能。这是因为标枪的使用方法和矛不同——标枪主要用于投掷，而矛主要用于刺。[[NetHack 3.6.0]]中，出于游戏性的考虑，标枪被并入了矛类别。

{{javelin skill table/zh-CN}}

== 起源 ==
{{wikipedia/zh-CN}}
标枪是一种主要通过投掷使用的轻型矛。标枪的英文“javelin”源自中古英语，词源为古法语词汇“javelot”的指小词形式。标枪一般是徒手投掷使用，但也存在一些用于提升标枪射程的器械。

考古发掘证明人类在旧石器时代晚期已经开始使用标枪，标枪也常常被人们同古希腊和古罗马等古代文明联系起来。在现代，祖鲁民族的战士们仍然会使用标枪作为武器，但标枪更多还是作为体育器械使用。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
Some variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 may retain the spear skill, while other variants based on later versions typically do not.

===SLASH'EM===
[[SLASH'EM]] retains the javelin skill as separate from the spear skill. This also applies to [[SlashTHEM]].

===dNetHack===
[[dNetHack]] merges the javelin skill into the spear skill. The javelin deals 1d8 damage to all monsters, and can be poisoned, and the [[Atlatl (dNetHack)|atlatl]] serves as a [[launcher]] for javelins and other spears.

[[dNetHack artifacts#Amhimitl|Amhimitl]] is a neutral [[artifact]] javelin made of [[bone]] that acts as the [[crowning]] gift for [[neutral]] [[Archeologist]]s. It has +1d5 to-hit and deals +1d8 [[fire]] damage against monsters without [[fire resistance]], along with +3d4 holy or unholy damage when blessed or cursed respectively. Amhimitl returns to your quiver when fired and can be [[multishot]], which causes it to be thrown immediately after returning multiple times in quick succession - the artifact does not return if it misfires, and any multishot is aborted if this occurs.

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], a javelin can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining 2 [[crossbow bolt]]s and a spear.

A javelin can be combined with a [[glaive]] to create a [[lance]].

== 引用及注释 ==
<references/>
{{nethack-367/zh-CN}}
[[Category:Weapons/zh-CN|BIAOQIANG]]
